about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Our Story
about.paragraph1: Aurora was created with one simple yet heartfelt dream â€” to allow girls and women to feel as if they have stepped into the fairytale world they always wished was real.
about.paragraph2: This is more than just an online store. Aurora is a space filled with warmth, love, and sincerity, where every detail is chosen to bring comfort and joy. Our main goal is to support people by offering everyday products at affordable prices â€” and sometimes even completely free â€” making life a little brighter and easier.
about.paragraph3: We want everyone who visits Aurora to feel the same emotions that Disney once gave us â€” fairytale, nostalgia, love, honesty, and small magical moments that make ordinary days feel special.
about.paragraph4: I would like to express my deepest gratitude to my brother, who believed in me from the very beginning and supported me throughout the creation of this website. Special thanks also go to Ebi, whose inspiration led to the creation of Aurora's dedicated pet clothing collection.
about.paragraph5: I am truly grateful and happy for every person who supports Aurora. And most importantly â€” thank you for being here. Your support is the most important for Aurora ðŸ’–

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.intro:
aurora.com.ge â€“ Online Store
This document constitutes a legal agreement between the administration of the website aurora.com.ge and the User. By using the website, browsing products, or placing an order, the User confirms that they have read and agree to the Terms and Conditions listed below.

section1.title: 1. General Provisions
section1.p1: 1.1. The website aurora.com.ge is an online store offering customers the remote purchase of products.
section1.p2: 1.2. The Administration reserves the right to change or update these Terms at any time without prior notice.
section1.p3: 1.3. Updated Terms come into force immediately upon publication on the website.

section2.title: 2. The User
section2.p1: 2.1. The User may be any adult natural person or a legally operating legal entity.
section2.p2: 2.2. The User is obliged to provide accurate and real contact and delivery information.
section2.p3: 2.3. The User is responsible for the consequences caused by providing incorrect information.

section3.title: 3. Products
section3.p1: 3.1. Photos and descriptions of products presented in the online store are for informational purposes.
section3.p2: 3.2. Colors, details, or small design elements may differ slightly from the actual products.
section3.p3: 3.3. The Administration tries to ensure maximum accuracy of information, but does not exclude technical inaccuracies.

section4.title: 4. Prices and Payment
section4.p1: 4.1. All prices are indicated in Georgian Lari (GEL).
section4.p2: 4.2. The Administration is authorized to change prices at any time, however, this does not apply to already confirmed orders.
section4.p3: 4.3. Payment is made using the payment methods indicated on the website.
section4.p4: 4.4. An order is considered confirmed only after successful payment.

section5.title: 5. Ordering
section5.p1: 5.1. Placing an order means the User's consent to purchase products under these conditions.
section5.p2: 5.2. The Administration is authorized to cancel an order in case of a technical error, stock exhaustion, or other objective reason, of which the User will be notified.

section6.title: 6. Delivery
section6.p1: 6.1. Delivery is carried out to the address specified by the User.
section6.p2: 6.2. Delivery times depend on the location and the selected delivery method.
section6.p3: 6.3. The Administration is not responsible for delivery delays caused by third parties (courier, post).

section7.title: 7. Returns and Exchanges
section7.p1: 7.1. The User has the right to request a product return or exchange only if:
section7.li2: The product does not correspond to the ordered product
section7.p2: 7.2. Return/exchange is possible only in the case of unused products, in their original condition and packaging.
section7.p3: 7.3. Hygiene or personal use products are not subject to return, unless otherwise determined by law.
section7.p4: 7.4. No more than 3 calendar days must have passed since the order was received. Returns will not be accepted after the 3-day period.

section8.title: 8. Privacy
section8.p1: 8.1. The User's personal data is used only for processing the order and providing service.
section8.p2: 8.2. The Administration does not transfer the User's data to third parties, except in cases provided by law.

section9.title: 9. Intellectual Property
section9.p1: 9.1. All materials placed on the website (logo, photo, text, design) are the property of aurora.com.ge.
section9.p2: 9.2. Copying, distributing, or commercial use of materials without the written consent of the Administration is prohibited.

section10.title: 10. Limitation of Liability
section10.p1: 10.1. The Administration is not liable for temporary unavailability of the website due to technical glitches.
section10.p2: 10.2. The Administration is not responsible for consequences caused by incorrect use of products by the User.

section11.title: 11. Applicable Law
section11.p1: 11.1. This agreement is governed by the legislation of Georgia.
section11.p2: 11.2. All disputes are considered by the courts of Georgia.
